Package javelin.model.world.location.dungeon.feature

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Altar
    Holds the Relic for this temple.
    Brazier  
    Chest
    Loot!
    Feature
    An interactive dungeon tile.
    Fountain
    Heals hit points and spell uses.
    FruitTree  
    Herb
    Similar to a Chest but requires someone with enough Survival and results in a higher-than average Potion treasure.
    LearningStone
    Allows a Combatant to learn a single Upgrade.
    Portal  
    Spirit  
    StairsDown
    Descends deeper into the dungeon.
    StairsUp
    Leaves dungeon or goes to upper floor.
    Trap
    A trap is a semi-permanent strategic dungeon feature that deals subdual (non-lethal) damage to a single character.
